step.datasource: select ab.HID as sleutel ,'Systeemmelding: contract ' + hr.fullname + ' verloopt op ' + cast(convert(nvarchar, ab.enddate, 105) as varchar) as Description , 'Type contract: ' + ab.description as WorkflowComments , cast('1' as int) as Private , cast('7350' as int) as empID , cast('0' as int) as Type from absences ab with (nolock), humres hr with (nolock) where ab.empid = hr.res_id and type = 11001 and ab.enddate > getdate() and ab.enddate < dateadd (day, 63 ,getdate())

select ab.HID as sleutel ,'Systeemmelding: contract ' + hr.fullname + ' verloopt op ' + cast(convert(nvarchar, ab.enddate, 105) as varchar) as Description , 'Type contract: ' + ab.description as WorkflowComments , cast('1' as int) as Private , hr.repto_id as empID , cast('0' as int) as Type from absences ab with (nolock), humres hr with (nolock) where ab.empid = hr.res_id and type = 11001 and ab.enddate > getdate() and ab.enddate < dateadd (day, 63 ,getdate())
